mapper.sql: id, file_version, update_time, download, md5, size, mappingid, businessid
mapper.select:
select ,
from updatefile where mappingid LIKE '${id}' or mappingid LIKE '${id},%' or mappingid LIKE '%,${id}' or mappingid LIKE '%,${id},%'

select
,
from updatefile where businessid=#{BusinessID} order by update_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE updatefile SET mappingid=replace(mappingid,CONCAT('\,','${id}'),'') WHERE mappingid LIKE CONCAT('%','${id}','%')
mapper.insert:

update updatefile
file_version = #{fileVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
download = #{download,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
